response.original_title: Seas the Day: The Sailing Movie
response.overview: Seas the Day: The Sailing Movie is a genre-defying documentary that blends real-world adventure with deeply human storytelling. It transcends typical sailing documentaries by blending docu-fiction with a narrative inspired by Joseph Campbellâ€™s classic The Hero's Journey. Directed by Ryan Luskin, an anthropologist and teacher, the film follows his family's quest across sixteen countries, learning life skills from diverse cultures.
response.tagline: A Genre-Defying Documentary 10+ Years in the Making
response.title: Seas the Day: The Sailing Movie
